constantValues: A company that represents a customer or a potential customer.

members.name: annualReviewDate

constantValues: The date on which the company’s relationship with the bank needs to be reviewed (i.e. account planning to be done).

members.description: The date on which the company’s relationship with the bank needs to be reviewed (i.e. account planning to be done).

members.name: availableLimit

constantValues: Total amount remaining from the credit line/limit implemented against the client.

members.description: Total amount remaining from the credit line/limit implemented against the client.

members.name: availableLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Available Limit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Available Limit in base currency.

members.name: banksYTDRevenue

constantValues: Total revenue generated by the bank from the sales to the client and services utilized by the client in the current year.

members.description: Total revenue generated by the bank from the sales to the client and services utilized by the client in the current year.

members.name: banksYTDRevenueBase

constantValues: Value of the Bank’s YTD Revenue in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Bank’s YTD Revenue in base currency.

members.name: companysProfitInTheLastYear

constantValues: Company’s Profit in the Last Year
Total profit earned by the company in the previous year as reported by them in their financial reports.

members.displayName: Company’s Profit in the Last Year
members.description: Total profit earned by the company in the previous year as reported by them in their financial reports.

members.name: companysProfitInTheLastYearBase

constantValues: Company’s Profit in the Last Year (Base)
Value of the Company’s Profit in the Last Year in base currency.

members.displayName: Company’s Profit in the Last Year (Base)
members.description: Value of the Company’s Profit in the Last Year in base currency.

members.name: companyTurnoverInTheLastYear

constantValues: Company Turnover in the last Year
Company’s annual turnover amount as reported by them in their financial reports.

members.displayName: Company Turnover in the last Year
members.description: Company’s annual turnover amount as reported by them in their financial reports.

members.name: companyTurnoverInTheLastYearBase

constantValues: Company Turnover in the last Year (Base)
Value of the Company Turnover in the last Year in base currency.

members.displayName: Company Turnover in the last Year (Base)
members.description: Value of the Company Turnover in the last Year in base currency.

members.name: daysPastDue

constantValues: Number of days for which the client has been in Past Due status,

members.description: Number of days for which the client has been in Past Due status,

foreignKeyAttribute.name: enrollmentBranchId

constantValues: The bank’s branch at which customer was enrolled.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The bank’s branch at which customer was enrolled.

members.name: implementedLimit

constantValues: Total credit line/limit implemented in the core banking system or Limit Management System for the client to utilize.

members.description: Total credit line/limit implemented in the core banking system or Limit Management System for the client to utilize.

members.name: implementedLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Implemented Limit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Implemented Limit in base currency.

members.name: limitReviewDate

constantValues: Date on which the company’s main credit line/limit will be expired.

members.description: Date on which the company’s main credit line/limit will be expired.

members.name: pastDueSince

constantValues: The date on which the company missed the first payment against the borrowings.

members.description: The date on which the company missed the first payment against the borrowings.

members.name: profitTier

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Internal ranking of the commercial customer based on profitability to the bank

members.description: Internal ranking of the commercial customer based on profitability to the bank

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'profitTier_display' is added to the 'Account' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'profitTier'
addSupportingAttribute.name: profitTier_display

members.name: returnOnCapital

constantValues: The rate of risk adjusted return on capital of the company.

members.description: The rate of risk adjusted return on capital of the company.

members.name: riskRating

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The rating assigned to the client by the bank in overall risk as reported by risk rating tools such as Moody’s.

members.description: The rating assigned to the client by the bank in overall risk as reported by risk rating tools such as Moody’s.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'riskRating_display' is added to the 'Account' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'riskRating'
addSupportingAttribute.name: riskRating_display

members.name: totalDeposits

constantValues: Company’s total deposits with our bank including all the savings, current, and deposit accounts.

members.description: Company’s total deposits with our bank including all the savings, current, and deposit accounts.

members.name: totalDepositsBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Deposits in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Deposits in base currency.

members.name: totalLimit

constantValues: Total credit line/limit assigned to the company by our bank.

members.description: Total credit line/limit assigned to the company by our bank.

members.name: totalLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Limit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Limit in base currency.

members.name: totalLoans

constantValues: Company’s total loans with the bank,

members.description: Company’s total loans with the bank,

members.name: totalLoansBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Loans in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Loans in base currency.

members.name: totalPastDue

constantValues: Total amount of borrowings for which the repayment by the client is overdue.

members.description: Total amount of borrowings for which the repayment by the client is overdue.

members.name: totalPastDueBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Past Due in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Past Due in base currency.

members.name: utilizedLimit

constantValues: Total credit that has been utilized by the company from the assigned limit (by cash based and non-cash based borrowings).

members.description: Total credit that has been utilized by the company from the assigned limit (by cash based and non-cash based borrowings).

members.name: utilizedLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Utilized Limit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Utilized Limit in base currency.

definitions.description: A company that represents a customer or a potential customer.
